author: MSNBC.com
title: Subscribe to ‘So You Wanna Be President,’ a new podcast from Chris Matthews
description: Chris’ new podcast “So You Wanna Be President” is about what it takes to win the nomination. The first two episodes are available right now, so listen and subscribe for free on Apple podcasts or wherever you get your podcasts.

author: Msnbc
title: Reports: McConnell doesn’t have votes to block witnesses in impeachment trial
description: It's unclear whether Mitch McConnell has nailed down the 50 votes he needs from his caucus to block witnesses at the President's trial. Several news outlets are currently reporting that Mitch McConnell said he doesn't yet have votes he would need.
